summary:
Oh my God! Shut up! Or I’ll blow your tiny head to pieces!
My dad is going to kill you in the face!
No, I’m going to kill your...
body:
Oh my God! Shut up! Or I’ll blow your tiny head to pieces!

My dad is going to kill you in the face!

No, I’m going to kill your dad in the face.

No! Why?

Because he is an arsehole.

You can’t say sh*t about Dad!

I can!

You can’t!

Why are you shouting?

I will kill you!

I will kill you! You are going to die!

Ohhh! What will make you stop shouting?

Food.

What?

I’m hungry.

Killing Eve 1x8

Food.

I’m hungry.

tags: earlier we were in Lillian Gilbreth’s haunted childhood home?
summary: I just dreamed that I was helping Villanelle and some guy (from Killing Eve) escape a sticky situation. We were driving along...
body:
I just dreamed that I was helping Villanelle and some guy (from Killing Eve) escape a sticky situation. We were driving along the highway when they announced that they planned to get out of the car

On said highway

At high speed

Leaving the other girl in the car and I to keep said car from crashing and killing us both, or not as the case may have been

I took the wheel, but then they said they wanted to go to a subway station and call a Lyft instead. They started calling the Lyft but the signal sucked just there, and the GPS was getting confused by the interstate around Boston-

And then I woke up

I do not watch Killing Eve; I’ve just seen the GIFsets

and tumblr keeps not putting it in the tags
hmu if you want the tag fic i wrote to accompany this lol
summary: besides sexy villaneve moments, im so excited to see more soft!villanelle. we caught a glimpse of her in the last episode. the...
body:
besides sexy villaneve moments, im so excited to see more soft!villanelle. we caught a glimpse of her in the last episode. the genuine nervousness and giddy exhilaration of being within such close proximity to eve made her as cute as a button. villanelle always has something to say, and in that moment, she was speechless. stopped dead in her tracks. she was in awe of eve. she was taking her in. the slow caress of her hand across eve’s cheek, feeling her hair in between her fingers. delicate and vulnerable.

there’s a major emphasis this season on the darkness within eve bubbling up to the surface. but i believe villanelle’s arc will be the exact opposite. they take from each other. eve takes villanelle’s darkness and villanelle takes some of eve’s light. it’s a constant push and pull between them.

as much as i want to see eve kicking ass and taking names, i want to see villanelle unsure of herself, unsure of what to do with these new feelings. i want to see her content. i want to see those quiet moments where she doesn’t have anything to say, and she falls into whatever she’s doing softly and slowly.

i have so many feelings about soft!villanelle okay and i just need her back on my screen doing her little shimmy and playing with her crush’s hair.

summary: Okay I'm gonna start watching killing eve and I'm trusting you guys on here about it.. I for real hope its not scary or gory. It...
body: Okay I’m gonna start watching killing eve and I’m trusting you guys on here about it.. I for real hope its not scary or gory. It looks really good, but I do get scared and freaked out easily because I’m really a small child apparently and not actually 25 years old. Anything that says psychopath killer in the description I’m usually out..but everyone keeps posting about it and I’m just giving in to peer pressure.

blog.name: villanelleismyeviltwin
blog.title: Killing Eve is My Obsession
blog.description: Villaneve obsess with each other. I’m obsessed with them, especially Villanelle. She is my evil twin and I love her to the moon and back! Everything on this show is fucking genius! So, this blog is dedicated to anything related to Killing Eve, Jodie Comer, and Sandra Oh only — not multi-fandom. If you’re looking for Killing Eve stuff, just get on board. I make gifsets when I have free time. Visit My Site if you'd like. I do some shitty stuff there LOL!

blog.title: icarus, point to the sun
blog.description:
18 / uk
an unjoined person who hangs around doorways

summary: i might have said this on here before but what i really admire about phoebe waller-bridge is her commitment to taking a...
body: i might have said this on here before but what i really admire about phoebe waller-bridge is her commitment to taking a character and letting her inform the work totally - to the extent that that the form will usually begin as something totally different to what the viewer understands it as (e.g. fleabag as a tragedy that thinks it’s a single camera comedy, killing eve as spy story-turned-fucked up romance). it’s this really new way of crafting form and there’s something very real about it, telling us something about the way that people can never quite grasp the shape of their life from within.
